column1: # Purpose: Define reuse policies for different content types to avoid audience fatigue
# Usage: Load this file to determine when content can be republished and what modifications are needed
# min_reuse_gap_days: Minimum days between posting the same/similar content
# modification_required: Whether the content must be modified before reuse (true/false)
# modification_level: How significant the modification must be (light/medium/heavy)
# seasonal: Whether content is tied to specific seasons/holidays/events (true/false)
